column4: did the fglrx driver that was released a couple days ago fix the Suspend problem with Gutsy?
did the fglrx driver that was released a couple days ago fix the Suspend problem with Gutsy?
no. Instead it introduces more problems. Stick with what you have, if it works reasonably well.
well i dont have suspend or hibernate working (which is a complete PITA), but otherwise i have everything working as needed...  thanks...
